item.title: Poor management of waste services, 29th August
item.description:
The waste services department at Enfiekd council needs to be put in special measures . I have reported this dumped bin on hoppers road n21 by downes court a week ago . It still remains uncollected and now serving as an unsightly impromptu second bin full of waste and flies .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodland Way, Palmers Green, London

item.title: Human, white van man, noise 1am, 29th August
item.description:

item.title: Multiple street lights not working between 1 - 38 Bromley gardens on the same side of the road it, 29th August
item.description:
Multiple street lights not working between 1 - 38 on the same side of the road it Is becoming dangerous to walk out at night as there have been mysterious individuals leaking feels unsafe and it is very dark when coming in late my children are all scared it has been like this for around 4 weeks and problem still has not been fixed. Please help urgently thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bromley Gardens, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A dead cat found outside our house, 28th August

item.title: Trip Hazard on Sidewalk Adjacent to 103 Redpoll Way, Erith, 28th August
item.description:
The hazard has been caused by tree root activity from a tree planted and maintained by Peabody Housing Association as part of their Park Improvement works. The roots have lifted and damaged the pavement surface, creating an uneven walkway which poses a significant risk to pedestrians. I have previously raised this issue directly with Peabody (letter hand-delivered on 11th August 2025), but to date I have received no acknowledgement or response. In the meantime, the condition of the pavement continues to deteriorate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kale Road, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Oven fly tipped in Capel House, 28th August
item.description:
Hello, as per my previous report (ref 8069713) there is an oven which was ripped out of a flat in Capel House and left in the stairwell on Floor 3. The previous report was closed as complete but the oven is still there. Please can this be resolved.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Loddiges Road, Hackney, London
